name: prized
content:

considered valuable and important: The 1961 vintage is highly prized among wine connoisseurs. Her photograph is among my most prized possessions.

considered to be very valuable and important: The network owns two of the country's most prized TV franchises. Their £1.5 million property is located in a highly prized residential area. prized assets/commodities/resources prized clients/recruits
